name: Kestra
title: kestra.io
shortDescription: Kestra is an open-source declarative orchestration platform designed to simplify complex workflows. It is ideal for developers across industries, enabling them to automate and schedule business logic in any language. With over 600 plugins and 250+ blueprints, Kestra integrates seamlessly with various stacks, enhancing ERP transformations and accelerating CI/CD processes. Example use case: Leroy Merlin France utilized Kestra to scale its data production by 900%.
pros: Scalable to enterprise needs with security features
cons: Requires familiarity with YAML and Terraform
Open-source model may need internal support
Limited information on direct customer support
